physical_examinations.relevant_findings: 7 year and 6 month old girl with left breast bud measuring 4 cm x 3 cm in diameter on the left side, no breast tissue growth on the right side. Pubic hair Tanner stage 1. Laboratory tests: LH 0.01 mIU/mL, FSH 0.319 mIU/mL, estradiol < 1 pg/mL.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Breast development resolved 6 months after discontinuing use of the lavender cologne.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: 3 year and 11 month old girl with right side breast tissue growth measuring 3 cm x 3 cm, pubic hair Tanner stage 1. Breast ultrasound confirmed ductal development measuring 3.28 cm x 2.8 cm.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Total resolution of breast tissue noted 6 months after discontinuing the soap containing lavender oil.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: 7 year and 9 month old girl with left subareolar breast tissue, Tanner stage 2, pubic hair Tanner stage 1. Pelvic ultrasound showed enlarged uterus with a thin endometrial stripe of 0.07 cm and prepubertal ovaries.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Breast tissue completely regressed upon evaluation 3 months after discontinuing lavender oil exposure.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: 7 year and 11 month old boy with bilateral breast development measuring 4 cm x 4 cm in diameter and 3 cm in depth. Testicular volume 1 mL and normal chromosome microarray.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Resolution of breast tissue was noted 6 months after discontinuation of lavender cologne.
